text: Big Deer State Park is a state park in Groton, Vermont. The park is a campground located in Groton State Forest close to the Groton Nature Center, Boulder Beach State Park and Stillwater State Park. The park features 23 tent/RV sites and 5 lean-tos. There is a restroom with hot showers. A sanitary dump station is available at Stillwater, but no hookups. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:State parks of Vermont Category:Protected areas of Caledonia County, Vermont Category:Groton, Vermont
title: Big Deer State Park
